reviewText:
DVD on March 23, 1999. The video features eleven international Playmates. In there lone segments they are not given a lot of air time and when they have the camera to them self, the nudity is brief or not does not strip down. In scenes where they are shown with another Playmate it is 50\50. If nudity is shown it is mainly in the photo shoots for when they were posing Playboy of their country. Below is a list of Playmates in the order that they were shown. I only wrote down first names because that all the video show and the country they hail from.

Cristina Mortagua\Brazil-10 seconds of nudity
Brazil Playboy Playmate for May 1992
Ting Chan\Taiwan-Barely nude
Cida Costa\Brazil-Mostly Nude
Brazil Playboy Playmate for December 1988
Kim\Holland-Not Nude
Diana Van Laar\Holland-Nude in her photo shoots
Penthouse Pet of the Month for December 1990
Angelique Dijkhuizen\Holland-Nude in her photo shoots
Holland Playboy Playmate for December 1992
Kelly James\Australia-Nude in photo shoot and segment
Australia Playboy Playmate for November 1992
Sarah\Germany-Not Nude
Sarka Luksova\Czechoslovakia-Nude in photo shoots, not nude in segment
Czechoslovakia Playboy Playmate for May 1991
Hungary Playboy Playmate for July 1991
Italy Playboy Playmate for August 1991
Teresa Linnane\Australia-Nude is shoot and segment
Australia Playboy Playmate for October 1990
Kelly James & Teresa-Nude in jungle segment
Martina\Germany-Nude in photo shoot and segment
Kim and Diana-Nude in the tub segment
Sarka-Nude in the bed segment

The video started off weak and it was not until the last twenty minutes did it try to get better. In the end I was disappointed. Playboy - International Playmates only gets a D+.

In scenes where they are shown with another Playmate it is 50\50. If nudity is shown it is mainly in the photo shoots for when they were posing Playboy of their country.
